backend/main.mo: Defines authorization-backed actor with user profiles, client fitness data types, and helpers for sorting and permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records with affected files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme color tokens and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading root container, Vite script, and SheetJS for Excel export.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, init-data loading, routing, layouts, and debug panel.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding and onboarding feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to submit their name and create a profile.
frontend/src/components/clients/Activate: Dialog for activating a client plan by selecting a start date and follow-up day with validation before confirming.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientsS: Dropdown button that lets users filter clients by status and shows counts for each filter option.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientSt: Renders a status badge for a client based on display status with different visual variants.
frontend/src/components/clients/ExportCl: Dialog for exporting client data to Excel, allowing full export or selecting specific fields.
frontend/src/components/clients/FollowUp: Dialog prompting users to mark a follow-up as done or not, with optional or required notes depending on mode.
Displays a client’s follow-up status, history, and a button to manually mark follow-up as done.
frontend/src/components/clients/PauseCli: Dialog for pausing a client plan by entering pause duration and reason with validation before confirming.
frontend/src/components/clients/RenewSub: Modal for renewing a client subscription with month selection, extra days, date input, validation, and confirm callback.
frontend/src/components/clients/Subscrip: Displays a table of sorted client subscriptions with status indicators, dates, and duration details.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Renewa: Dialog listing clients whose plans expire this month, with export functionality and navigation to client details.
frontend/src/components/debug/InitialLoa: Debug panel showing timing events during initial load with live updates and total duration.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout providing navigation, header, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/RouteLoad: Simple centered loading spinner used as a route-level fallback.
frontend/src/components/progress/Progres: Renders weight and body measurement line charts from client progress data or shows an empty state.
Form component for entering body measurements and submitting them via useAddProgress, with validation and reset logic.
Displays a sortable table of progress entries with trends and formatted measurements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Provides an actorReady flag to delay queries until actor initialization stabilizes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading, login, logout, and exposes identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of typed data-fetching and mutation hooks using react-query, handling actor readiness and caching logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.ts: Simple hash-based router hook with navigation and clientCode parsing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and base styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ClientProfilePage.tsx: Displays a detailed client profile, handles activation, pause, renewal, expiration, progress tracking, and lazy‑loaded charts/export dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsListPage.tsx: Lists all clients with filtering, searching, and export preparation using lazy‑loaded export dialog.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows high‑level client metrics, expiring clients, and monthly renewal opportunities with a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardClientPage.tsx: Handles creating a new client with onboarding state selection and success screen navigation.
frontend/src/utils/clientCode.ts: Provides utilities for formatting client codes and matching them against search queries.
frontend/src/utils/clientExportFields.ts: Defines fields and accessors used when exporting client data, including subscription and progress info.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Converts backend errors into user‑friendly messages with specific normalization rules.
frontend/src/utils/excelExport.ts: Exports client data to an Excel file using SheetJS, building headers, rows, and autosized columns before triggering a download.
frontend/src/utils/followUp.ts: Provides functions to determine follow‑up due dates, check history for today, and compute latest follow‑up status for a client.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats timestamps into human‑readable dates, date‑times, or Excel‑friendly YYYY‑MM‑DD strings.
frontend/src/utils/initialLoadTimings.ts: Lightweight timing tracker that records labeled performance events and outputs a consolidated console report for initial load.
frontend/src/utils/plan.ts: Computes total plan days, calculates plan end dates, and formats dates for input fields.
Calculates current‑month boundaries and filters/counts clients whose subscription ends this month and are currently active.
frontend/src/utils/status.ts: Determines client activation and status, computes display status including expiring states, and aggregates client status metrics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known issues, and existing performance‑related feature requirements.
